TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An herb used in traditional Chinese medicine to treat certain medical problems. It may have anticancer effects.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "herba Scutellaria barbatae"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Hierba usada en la medicina tradicional china para tratar ciertos problemas médicos. Podría tener efectos anticancerosos.
